text: Aur jab woh Madiyan ke kunwein (well) par pahuncha to usne dekha ke bahut se log apne jaanwaron ko pani pila rahey hain, aur unsey alag ek taraf do auratein apne jaanwaron ko rok rahi hain. Moosa ne in auraton se pucha “tumhein kya pareshani hai?” unhon ne kaha “Hum apne jaanwaron ko pani nahin pila sakti jab tak yeh charwahe apne jaanwar nikal kar na le jayein, aur hamare waalid ek bahut boodey aadmi hain”
